name: War of Castles (Tiktikawy)
description:
Protect your island from continuous enemy attacks, use your army to destroy monsters and their ships.

Use your archery hero AND AIM FOR THE HEADS .
defeat the evil king.

game contain 25 levels and 5 bosses all made with Unreal engine 4 the best game engine in my opinion.
all credits for the assets designers who share their work at itch.io thank you all

and i hope you like my game :)
